糖尿病治疗的里程碑：转基因牛在牛奶中产生人胰岛素来自巴西南部的一头不起眼的棕色牛创造了历史，成为第一头能够在牛奶中产生人胰岛素的转基因牛。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240314/Milestone-in-diabetes-treatment-Transgenic-cow-products- human-insulin-in-milk.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240314/Milestone-in-diabetes-treatment-Transgenic-cow-products- human-insulin-in-milk.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=b51df0d1-3f3b-468d-9748-b562176ae2f4 Thu, 14 Mar 2024 14:02:08 -0400 Milestone in diabetes treatment: Transgenic cow produces human insulin in milk

快速、易于使用的诊断测试可以挽救更多类鼻疽患者的生命在全球范围内，超过一半的患者在感染被忽视的热带疾病类鼻疽后死亡，通常是在确诊之前。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240313/Rapid-easy-to-use-diagnostic-test-could-save-more-lives-from-melioidosis.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240313/Rapid-easy-to-use-diagnostic-test-could-save-more-lives-from-melioidosis.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=860b04ca-fc52-4eba-8bcf-255618962fa5 Wed, 13 Mar 2024 23:58:00 -0400 Rapid, easy-to-use diagnostic test could save more lives from melioidosis
